casebody.data:
Linda SHAO, petitioner,
v.
McMANIS FAULKNER, LLP, et al. No. 17-256. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 30, 2017.

Motion of Mothers of Lost Child for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
